titleStmt.title: Catalogue du Quatrième Salon de Photographie du Photo-Club de Paris

bibl.title: Salon de photographie, 4e année 1897 : catalogue / Photo-Club de Paris
bibl.author: Photo-Club de Paris

samplingDecl.p: This electronic version of the catalog only reproduces the entries that correspond to exhibited works. All text preceding or succeeding the list of documents is not reproduced below.
